```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(rmarkdown)
```

```{r}
#create a list for weekdays
weekday <- c("Monday")
             #, "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday", "Sunday")
#create output file name
output_file <- paste0(weekday, "Analysis.md")
#create a list for each team with just the day parameter
params <- lapply(weekday, FUN = function(x){list(dow = x)})
#put into a data frame 
reports <- tibble(output_file, params)
reports
```


```{r}
#use apply function to generate documents
apply(reports, MARGIN = 1, 
            FUN = function(x){
                render(input = "ST558Project2.Rmd", output_file=x[[1]] , params = x[[2]]
                )})
```
